trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.
trans-unit.target: 使用範本顯示項目的資料繫結清單控制項。

trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Templates](#templates)
trans-unit.target: [範本](#templates)

trans-unit.target: [自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control to display a template-defined data bound list.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項來顯示範本定義的資料繫結的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control supports selecting and editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項支援選取和編輯。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 範本

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control can be manipulated by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>可以使用範本的操作控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the supported templates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的範本。

trans-unit.source: Template Name
trans-unit.target: 範本名稱

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中替代項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和配置項目的目前正在編輯中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和配置的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，不會顯示頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和配置的標頭區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，不會顯示標頭區段。

trans-unit.source: Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 所需的範本中的項目中提供的內容和配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中目前選取的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>用。

trans-unit.source: If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中的項目之間的分隔符號<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，不會顯示為分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: At the very minimum, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> needs to be defined to display the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 在最起碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>需要定義中的項目顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 其他範本可以用來提供自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>可自訂控制項，藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定替代項目中的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the item being edited in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定正在編輯中的項目樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the footer in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定在頁尾的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the header in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的標頭中的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的樣式中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定選取的項目中的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的樣式中的項目之間的分隔符號<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Shows or hides the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏的標頭區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Display Direction and Layout
trans-unit.target: 顯示方向和配置

trans-unit.source: The display direction of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control can be vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 顯示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項都可以是垂直或水平。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the display direction.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性，以指定的顯示方向。

trans-unit.source: The layout of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制會與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>以資料表格式，而`RepeatLayout.Flow`顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>不資料表結構。

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: 安全性

trans-unit.source: The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information.
trans-unit.target: `DataList`控制項可以包含控制項，可讓使用者輸入資訊。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[ASP.NET Web Pages 中驗證使用者輸入](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control to display a list of items from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項來顯示資料來源的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中替代項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中替代項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性提供替代的自訂樣式中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 優先順序

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂樣式替代項目，加上`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to specify a different background color for alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性來指定不同的背景色彩的替代項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 中替代項目的樣板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that contains the template for alternating items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中替代項目的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>屬性，即可控制的替代中的項目內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 外觀的替代項目由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定替代項目範本，加上`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目） 並再重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the control's data source; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the control is being recreated from view state and should not be data-bound.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用控制項的資料來源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示控制項是從檢視狀態重新建立，且不應該進行資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the data list control, with or without the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用或不使用指定的資料來源，建立用來呈現資料清單控制項的控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>衍生自訂中的實作時，將會使用主要由控制項開發人員的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項代表頁首、 頁尾、 分隔符號及 [資料] 清單中包含的資料繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取透過資料清單的資料繫結項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取所有項目類型，包括標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號項目，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method to customize how <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法，以自訂方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>建立或加入至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> method to customize templates for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法，以自訂的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default style object that is used internally by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control to implement all style related properties.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設的樣式物件，這個物件是由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項在內部使用，以實作所有的樣式相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle" /> that contains the default style properties for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle" />，包含控制項的預設樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in deriving a custom implementation from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在衍生的自訂實作，從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlStyle%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always displays horizontal grid lines with no cell spacing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlStyle%2A>自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它永遠都會顯示水平格線中沒有儲存格間距與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified location within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> to place the created item.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 中要放置建立項目的指定位置。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" />，表示要建立的指定項目型別。

trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> created with the specified list-item type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定清單項目型別建立的新 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in creating a custom implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員建立的自訂實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> method is functionally equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>方法在功能上相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.%23ctor%2A>建構函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> properties are initialized for the new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> using the specified values, but the item is not inserted into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A>屬性會初始化新的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>使用指定的值，但此項目不會插入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項代表頁首、 頁尾、 分隔符號及 [資料] 清單中包含的資料繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取透過資料清單的資料繫結項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取所有項目類型，包括標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號項目，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to create your own derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> type, or to set additional member properties when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> is created.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>就會引發事件時`Edit`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to the selected row and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性，以選取的資料列，然後重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>事件。

trans-unit.target: 它可讓您編輯選取的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>負責控制何時`Edit`按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="Edit" /> command name.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="Edit" /> 命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommandName> field to represent the `Edit` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommandName>欄位來表示`Edit`命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index number of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中所選取來編輯的項目索引編號。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control to edit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中所選取來編輯的項目索引編號。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to programmatically specify the item to edit.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性，以程式設計方式指定要編輯的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine the index of the item selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷編輯選取之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: To unselect an item, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取項目，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中所選取來編輯的項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中所選取來編輯的項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>屬性中進行編輯選取的項目的提供的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 優先順序

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂樣式選取要編輯的項目，加上`<EditItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<EditItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>屬性來指定不同的外觀進行編輯的使用者所選取的項目。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>屬性來控制內容中進行編輯選取之項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 編輯由選取之項目的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的範本進行編輯選取的項目，加上`<EditItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> control, defined in each template of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control, are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否擷取並顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> 控制項 (定義於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項的各個樣板中) 的資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rows of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> control, defined in each template of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要擷取並顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> 控制項 (定義於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項的各個樣板中) 的資料列，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are specified by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項由使用範本。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您會列出您想要顯示範本中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template and display the rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制在範本中，並顯示資料表的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A> property to specify whether the rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control defined in each template of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A>屬性來指定是否的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項中的每個範本定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項就會擷取並顯示。

trans-unit.source: All rows extracted from the templates of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a single table.
trans-unit.target: 從範本擷取的所有資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制會顯示在單一資料表。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您從其他較小的資料表建立單一資料表又仍可維持的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for each template you want to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供語式正確<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項對於您想要包含在每個範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Only the rows of the tables will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 將顯示的資料表的資料列。

trans-unit.source: All other content in the template will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在範本中的所有其他內容將被忽略。

trans-unit.source: You must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for this feature to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制這項功能才能正常運作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=nameWithType> control is not compatible with this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項不是這個屬性與相容。

trans-unit.source: When you create a cell for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to control the number of columns the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項在範本中，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件來控制資料格所跨越的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to control the number of rows the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A>屬性，即可控制的資料格所跨越的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> properties do not affect the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性不會影響的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制當這個屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrate how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A> property to extract and display the rows of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> controls defined in the templates of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ExtractTemplateRows%2A>屬性來擷取和顯示的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項的範本中定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項頁尾區段的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項頁尾區段的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來提供的自訂樣式的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性也會有紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定覆寫繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the footer section, place the `<FooterStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂樣式的頁尾區段，將`<FooterStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<FooterStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<FooterStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`皆可看到此屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property to specify a custom background color for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性來指定自訂背景色彩的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項頁尾區段的樣板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> object that contains the template for the footer section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項頁尾區段的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the footer section.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性，即可控制頁尾區段的內容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the footer section is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾區段的外觀由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`皆可看到此屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性也會有紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定覆寫繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the footer section, place the `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁尾區段的範本，將`<FooterTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<FooterTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性來控制內容的頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the grid line style for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout" /> property is set to <see langword="RepeatLayout.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="RepeatLayout.Table" /> 時，取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout" /> 控制項的格線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> property to specify the grid line style for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A>屬性來指定格線列樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Style
trans-unit.target: 樣式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 無格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the horizontal grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the vertical grid line.
trans-unit.target: 顯示垂直格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平及垂直格線行。

trans-unit.source: This property only applies if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the heading section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the heading section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項標題區段的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the heading of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來提供的自訂樣式標題的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the heading section, place the `<HeaderStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂樣式的頁首區段，將`<HeaderStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<HeaderStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<HeaderStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`皆可看到此屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for the heading section of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項標題區段的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the heading section.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性，即可控制標題區段的內容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the header section is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區段的外觀由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowHeader%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`皆可看到此屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the heading section, place the `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的標題區段的範本，將`<HeaderTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<HeaderTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> object based on the specified templates and styles for the list-item type.
trans-unit.target: 根據清單項目型別的指定樣板和樣式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>主要由控制項開發人員使用方法來擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項代表頁首、 頁尾、 分隔符號及 [資料] 清單中包含的資料繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取透過資料清單的資料繫結項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取所有項目類型，包括標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號項目，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A> method to customize how <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateControlHierarchy%2A>方法，以自訂方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>建立或加入至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法，以自訂的範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中的任何按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control and is commonly used when you have a button control with a custom `CommandName` value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>按一下中的任何按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制及您有自訂的按鈕控制項通常使用於`CommandName`值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemDataBound> event is raised after an item is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: This event provides you with the last opportunity to access the data item before it is displayed on the client.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會提供您存取資料的項目顯示在用戶端之前的最後機會。

trans-unit.source: After this event is raised, the data item is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件之後，資料的項目已無法再使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> objects representing the individual items within the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示控制項中個別項目的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection" /> that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> objects representing the individual items within the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection" />，包含表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem" /> 控制項中個別項目的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection to programmatically control the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合以程式設計方式控制中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合不提供任何方法來新增或移除項目至集合。

trans-unit.source: However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以控制的項目內容所提供的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Only items bound to the data source are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 只有繫結至資料來源的項目包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 頁首、 頁尾及分隔符號不會包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection to display the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合中的項目顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that contains the style properties for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空白的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性的項目提供的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: Precedence
trans-unit.target: 優先順序

trans-unit.source: Style Property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, place the `<ItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂的項目樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制、 放置`<ItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<ItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<ItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性提供替代不同的外觀中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property to specify a different background color for the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性來指定不同的背景色彩中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中項目的樣板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the template for the items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項中項目的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> property to control the contents of the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>屬性，即可控制中的項目內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, place the `<ItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的項目範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制、 放置`<ItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<ItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<ItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>屬性提供替代不同的外觀中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>屬性，即可控制中的項目內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.LoadViewState%2A> method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.LoadViewState%2A>方法還原檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項所儲存的先前頁面要求從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定伺服器控制項的事件是否要在頁面的 UI 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已取消，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnCancelCommand%2A> method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.OnCancelCommand%2A>方法以提供的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目） 並再重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。
